body_html:
@geyuxiao tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate does evaluation during training and is essentially alternating between tf.estimator.train and tf.estimator.evalute. However the ckpts in tf.estimator.train_and tf.estimator.evalute may have a slight delay in reporting.

In this case, use tf.estimator.evalute and the corresponding auc values if you only care about final evaluation results.
body_text:
@geyuxiao tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate does evaluation during training and is essentially alternating between tf.estimator.train and tf.estimator.evalute. However the ckpts in tf.estimator.train_and tf.estimator.evalute may have a slight delay in reporting.
In this case, use tf.estimator.evalute and the corresponding auc values if you only care about final evaluation results.
body:
@geyuxiao `tf.estimator.train_and_evaluate` does evaluation during training and is essentially alternating between `tf.estimator.train` and `tf.estimator.evalute`. However the ckpts in `tf.estimator.train`_and `tf.estimator.evalute` may have a slight delay in reporting. 

In this case, use tf.estimator.evalute and the corresponding auc values if you only care about final evaluation results.
